name: CoCoMon NFT: Breed Your CoCos and Earn $COCO!
description: CoCoMon NFT: The first NFT Play-to-Earn game on the TON Mini App! Unlock exciting adventures with CoCo Eggs, which provide the opportunity to earn valuable $COCO tokens. The more valuable the NFT that hatches from each Egg, the more $COCO tokens you can mine!
